page.title: 06EARNING A LIVING IN GLENLUCE
page.content: The area has a{varied selection}of {shops and businesses.}There are eleven shops including a Post office,Grocers, drapers, butchers,newsagents and hairdressers.There is a bank.There are {5 small building firms}which employ a few locals.There is one large {agricultural business}which employs a lot of local people.There are 5 fully licensed Hotels. There is no chemist, the nearest being 10 miles away,so the local{G.P.dispenses his own drugs. Of the {staff}of the school four live in or near the village, whilst the {Head Teacher}lives 16 miles away. Many of the shopkeepers have been attracted to the village from cities and have settled for perhaps a lower income in order to savour the {quality of life.} Some of these are English people.
